div.div:
load grub.cfg
set prefix to /boot/grub2
set root to UUID of btrfs

div.div:
Subvolume set to BTRFS default root.
In case of openSUSE: /@/.snapshots/<N>/snapshot + prefix

switch.text: Subvolume set to BTRFS default root....

get snapshot list
using code in
/etc/grub.d/80_suse_btrfs_snapshot
